permissions: User can update if they are a manager/admin of the organization or they are the given-by user; changing organization requires admin and changing given-by requires manager/admin.
side_effects: Updates public praise attributes; recipient and culture value lists are replaced when provided.
validation_notes: At least one of --description, --recipient-ids, or --culture-value-ids is required. --recipient-ids and --culture-value-ids expect comma-separated lists of IDs.

flags.name: --recipient-ids
flags.description: Comma-separated list of recipient user IDs

flags.name: --culture-value-ids
flags.description: Comma-separated list of culture value IDs
